snippet.title: The Zebra Man! 🦓 - Announcement Trailer | 2024 🎮
snippet.description:
Revenge wears stripes! The Zebra-Man! 🦓is a hyper-charged pixel art top-down action game with brutal fist fights and blood spilling in your wake. Get out of impossible situations while unraveling time paradoxes and blasting the enemies you encounter along the way.

Available in 2024 on Steam, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series SX and Nintendo Switch.

🎮Wishlist it now on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2055360/The_ZebraMan/

Follow us on social media for more news:
🔵X: https://twitter.com/zerounogames
🔵Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/zerounogames

#videogame #retro #indie #indiegame #pixelart
